items.sentence: Every time that Tom comes to Australia, he always visits me.
You really should turn off the lights when you leave a room.
It looks like Tom is waiting for someone to give him a ride.
Do you think Tom would be willing to show me how to do that?
If you can\'t afford a lawyer, one will be provided for you.
I can\'t believe Tom really wanted to go to Boston with you.
Didn\'t you know Tom was going to be in Australia this week?
All the houses on this street were built by the same people.
Did you know that Tom was going to be in Australia all week?
Even though he has a college degree, Tom works as a janitor.
